transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hi, good afternoon sir. Main aapko Varsha baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART head office se. A Z S Pharma mein baat kar rahi thi sir main.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello. Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Haan yaar, aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main IndiaMART head office se baat kar rahi thi sir, IndiaMART senior manager.
Executive: Call kiya tha sir aapne connect kiya tha customer care pe right? Toh us wajah se maine aapko discussion ke liye connect kar liya.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir aapne customer care se connect kiya tha services ke liye, services ka apna. Baaki services ko aur improve karoge thoda time doge?
Executive: Haan, main aapki baat samajh gayi hu. Baaki sir dekhiye last time bhi apni baat hui thi services ko help karne ke liye video marketing ke through aapko bataya tha kya kuch unko use kare dekhiye. Check kare customer consumption pattern hai toh uska.
Customer: Haan, aari hai.
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan, aari hai.
Executive: Ji, main aapko yeh keh rahi hu sir last time bhi apni baat hui thi services ko leke IndiaMART ki. Maine aapka jo hai score bhi increase kara tha description vagera product mein add kari thi. Aap keh rahe the kuch aur product aap mujhe share karenge add karne ke liye. Toh woh bhi kare hai apan ne. Toh aapne us basis pe bhi service mein dekh rahi hu aapne use kari hai. Aur agar main aapko batau use karne ke baad se, theek hai? Last 6 tareekh ko apni baat hui thi uske baad ab isme baat karu kyuki maine sir aapko bataya tha minimum agar koi changes apan karte hai toh kam se kam 15 se 20 din uska pattern set hone mein lagta hai. Ab jab jaise ki main check kar rahi hu thoda sa aapka improvement aapko show hoga sir lekin abhi thoda pattern set hone dijiye cheezo ko dekhne dijiye. Plus aap bhi dekhenge ki abhi aapko calls bhi kaafi aa rahi hai. Toh usse bhi baat ho rahi hogi aapki customer ki kya discussion ho raha hai kya baat ho rahi hai. Usme customer aapko kya keh rahe hai. Retail ki bhi call aa rahi hongi I hope aapko chote piece ki hai na? Bulk order ki bhi aa rahi hogi. Toh usme kya baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir, yeh sab.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Sir meri baat suno. Yeh saari cheeze main aapki samajhti hu. Yeh aap keh rahe hai cheeze. Lekin ek baat aap yeh bhi toh socho jab apan ne baat kari thi is cheez ko leke toh kam se kam pattern set ho jaye uske hisab se toh aap follow up dekh lo. Haan ji puchiye sir.
Customer: Company ne.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai aap boliye.
Customer: Company ne jo account manager diya hai, kis liye diya hai?
Executive: Haan ji. Kya kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Company ne jo account manager pay kar rakha hai, kis liye kar rakha hai? Company ne jo hire kiya account manager diya company ko, uska fayda kya hai? Mujhe aaj tak kuch fayda nazar nahi aaya account manager ka.
Executive: Sir dekho, aapka jo catalog hai, aapke jo products hai na, theek hai? Woh online visible ho rahe hai proper tareeke se. Aapke jo product add hai unhi ke basis pe aapko call aa rahi hai. Ab aap yeh dekho agar monthly aapko 80 calls, 100 one call aise aa rahi hai. Toh iska matlab customer ko aapki profile dikh rahi hai tabhi woh aapko call kare warna se retail ya bulk dono call dono hi aapko aa rahi hongi. Isse result main aapko yeh nikal ke dena chah rahi hu, suno. Isse main aapko overall mein keh yeh rahi hu ki sir aapka product dikh raha hai, theek hai customer ko online visible ho raha hai. Lekin profile bas aapki nayi hai. Abhi aapki profile ko live hue hue 4 mahine hue hai aap dekho. 4-5 mahine theek hai? Aur wahi time aapka profile mein dikhta hai ki customer 4 mahine purana hai, 5 mahine, 5 hafte purana hai ya 5 mahine purana hai yeh time dikhta hai portal pe. Customer ka trust banne mein thoda time lagta hai jaise jaise profile purani hoti hai.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Boliye aap.
Customer: 4 mahina bhi koi kam time nahi hota hai. Samajh rahi hai na?
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hai. Main yeh nahi keh rahi hu time kam hai. Bas main aapko bata rahi hu ki dekho sir response aana start hua hai aapko. Lekin deal conversion agar nahi ho pa rahi hai ya deal conversion mein bhi abhi aapko time lag raha hai toh iske reason kya hai peeche peeche? Usko hum kaise improve kar sakte hai woh cheez bhi hai.
Customer: Utna utna mera dimag mat chatiye aap samajh rahi hai? Baar baar aap yahi sab baat bolti rehti hai. Aap phone kar deti hai aur aadha pauna ghanta isme laga deti hai. Meri baat suniye idhar. Aap chahti hai ki hum IndiaMART ke saath bane hue rahe toh hum aapko lead bana ke dete hai customer se deal karke aa dijiye toh.
Executive: Sir dekhiye.
Customer: Abhi baat suniye.
Executive: Ab main abhi suniye.
Customer: Yeh hamara staff bhi baat nahi karega. Aap hi kijiye dekhte hai kitna deal karti hai aap.
Executive: Sir dekho. Sabse pehli baat toh yeh hai ki aap.
Customer: Main woh sab cheeze kar sakti hu lekin that's not suniye meri baat suniye aap. Agar aisa possible hota aur company ne mujhe allow kiya hota toh main for sure aapko yeh sab cheeze karke deti. Aapke customer se baat karti, phone uthati, unka deal convert karke aapko deti, batati sir isme yeh baat hui hai, yeh kaam ki nahi hai, yeh phone nahi utha raha isne itna price bola hai isne itne dino mein bola hai. Yeh sab cheeze main aapko batati agar woh mera kaam hota toh.
Customer: Meri meri baat suniye pehle. Main utna jyada nahi bolna jitna mera punji mera punji invest hua hai na aap utna hi nikal ke dijiye toh.
Executive: Haan. Baat yaha baat kar liya bas.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Baat sirf baat karne ki baat nahi hai sir. Pata hai agar aapne kahi aapne paisa lagaya hai main maanti hu is cheez ko, theek hai? Lekin sirf paisa lagane se koi business grow nahi ho jata yeh baat aap bhi jaante hai. Offline business settle hone mein aapka bhi time laga hoga. Aap jaante ho nahi jaante ho batao. Main kuch galat keh rahi hu ya kuch naya keh rahi hu toh aap mujhe bolo. Ki ha madam yeh cheez aapne galat boli hai, theek hai? Ya yeh cheez aapne aise boli hai.
Customer: Sahi hai. Mera offline bhi business start kiya tha na toh kaam jo hai chalu ho gaya tha aisa nahi ki bilkul koi nahi rehta IndiaMART mein toh kuch ho hi nahi raha hai. Kya fayda hai aise online pe rakhne mein?
Customer: IndiaMART se toh badhiya Amazon hai, Flipkart hai. Waha pe customer leta hai yaha pe koi bhi nahi leta hai maal. Aap log bolte hai bulk wala bulk wala hai customer aap logo ke paas bulk wala.
Customer: Isliye mera jo hai intention ki yeh refund chodhiye bhaag nahi jaa raha. IndiaMART IndiaMART ka service nahi chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir dekho. Abhi aap meri cheez ek tareekh ko-
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services.

- Account manager not providing any benefit.

- No customers buying products on IndiaMART.

- Wants a refund for the subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive explained catalog visibility and benefits.

- Executive mentioned improvements take 15-20 days.

- Executive stated deal conversion depends on customer.

- Executive unable to provide customer support directly.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, account manager, buyleads
